keyPolicies.policyDescription: We secured £18 million from the Government to deliver the improvements to junctions along the A614.
Deliver the extension of the Robin Hood Line to Ollerton and Edwinstowe.
Invest in our roads and local infrastructure to ensure the best quality of life for residents.
Work with Ofsted to ensure that schools in Sherwood are the best standard they can be.
Continue to support local business owners and their work in Sherwood.
Ensure Sherwood sees its fair share of officers to keep families safe.

issues.education: Work with Ofsted to ensure that schools in Sherwood are the best standard they can be.
issues.transport: Deliver the extension of the Robin Hood Line to Ollerton and Edwinstowe. Invest in roads.

community.content: Invest in our roads and local infrastructure to make sure local residents throughout Sherwood have the best quality of life possible.

examples: We secured £18 million from the Government to deliver the improvements to junctions along the A614.
The Conservatives have already begun hiring 20,000 more police officers.
The North of Sherwood needs to be connected to Nottingham.
Sherwood has so many beautiful High Streets, and I will continue to support local business owners and the hard work they do in Sherwood.
I will continue to work with Ofsted, to make sure that schools in Sherwood are the best standard they can be.
Invest in our roads and local infrastructure, to make sure local residents throughout Sherwood have the best quality of life possible.
Deliver the extension of the Robin Hood Line to Ollerton and Edwinstowe.
Invest in our roads and local infrastructure to make sure local residents throughout Sherwood have the best quality of life possible.
Sherwood has so many beautiful High Streets, and I will continue to support local business owners and the hard work they do in Sherwood.
We secured £18 million from the Government to deliver the improvements to junctions along the A614.
The Conservatives have already begun hiring 20,000 more police officers.
